CrawlerImpl
public class CrawlerImpl.Parser
extends javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback

A HTML parser callback used by this class to detect links

Method Detail

handleSimpleTag

public void handleSimpleTag(javax.swing.text.html.HTML.Tag tag,
                            javax.swing.text.MutableAttributeSet attributes,
                            int pos)
Handles a simple html tag. A link if found if the tag has a href or src attribute. #'s are checked in the link and subsequent characters are removed. mailto links are ignored.

Overrides:
handleSimpleTag in class javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback

handleStartTag

public void handleStartTag(javax.swing.text.html.HTML.Tag t,
                           javax.swing.text.MutableAttributeSet a,
                           int pos)
Handles the beginning of a tag the same way. Links are stored in a Set so they are not added twice

Overrides:
handleStartTag in class javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback
